cells.m_text_in:
@echo off
rem build script for the project
rem [button: Debug]
rem set LANG=zh_CN.utf8
jc --readable_c_code zmain.jc --run

# TODO LIST
apply it to something
	port the btc trader trainer
	try-hard downloader
"conventional" variable names as a property on code input pins
	app@express, btc_state@btc, ...
	show those variables in a "context hint" window or something
	could show something else
	--
	"context hint" could really be useful - context utility functions
		context documentation... in md, could combine with AC
		identifier-indexed documentation
	a persistent notification
		when an id is typed, filter by it
			provide fhint for functions
	hints are input-specific...
		for each input, add the hints from each surrounding output block
			they may *duplicate*
		call qpad parser in ParseTextNode
		cached dfs list of dependant nodes
	doxygen doc support in qpad, then just do graph-based depends
	---
	dfs @qpadvar propagation
		API to add whole-file @qpadvar
dedicated preview nodes
	preview output for zjs script
		md / qpad rendering functions
	or external application
debugging
	redirected run like qpad notebooks
		can count as a preview node
	line info mapping
(test) @out format=var 
UI overhaul
	area labels
	put nodes on top of edges
	package updating UI
		package-groups: original caption
node y ordering:
	only set rebuild flag when ordering actually changes
	use edge y to account for dots
	when build-ungrouping, scale down inner node y values
make newly-created code snippets connect to all dangling in-ports on selected nodes
default interface layout: put the code editor window somewhere more convenient
drag-node-to-edge
git merging:
	https://github.com/dominictarr/xdiff
re-purpose the graph editor for shader editor?
	preview-only node class
un-depending packages
	package node?

@echo off
rem build script for 'c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc'
rem [button: Release]
cd /d c:/tp/qpad
jc -brelease -awin64 c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc
jc -brelease -awin32 c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc
cd bin\win32_release
del qpad3beta_32.7z
7z a qpad3beta_32.7z qpad.exe
cd /d c:\tp\qpad
cd bin\win64_release
del qpad3beta_64.7z
7z a qpad3beta_64.7z qpad.exe
del c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad_old.exe
ren c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe qpad_old.exe
copy qpad.exe c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe

cells.m_text_in:
#!/bin/sh
#[button: Translate]
cd /c/tp/qpad/res
grep -ERoh text:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * > ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh UI\._\\\(\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\)\\\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh UI\.Format\\\(\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\), * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh tooltip:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh ,name:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
